result.eng: Do you usually leave work at five?

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh

result.eng: She was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.

result.eng: The gas company's van was working in the street.

result.eng: He's working for some huge corporation in America.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine

result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críoċnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíċe seaċt lá in aġaiḋ na seaċtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.
